name: eagle-lottie-preview-vue
description: Eagle Lottie 预览插件 - Vue 3 重写版

scripts.build: vite build && npm run copy-assets && npm run move-html && npm run fix-paths
scripts.copy-assets: cp -r thumbnail dist/ && cp -r utils dist/ && cp -r images dist/ && cp logo.png dist/ && cp manifest.json dist/
scripts.move-html: mv dist/lottie.html dist/viewer/ && mv dist/lottie-zip.html dist/viewer/
